jsf:attribute.name: orientation
jsf:attribute.shortDescription: Allowed values are: northeast, northwest, southeast, southwest

jsf:attribute.name: system
jsf:attribute.shortDescription: Allowed values are: metric and english

jsf:attribute.name: major
jsf:attribute.shortDescription: Number of divisions on the scalebar

jsf:attribute.name: sub
jsf:attribute.shortDescription: Number of subdivisions per major division
